page.title: 01A General Review, Tockwith.
page.content: Our block, referred to as{ {Tockwith,}includes the three villages Tockwith, Bickerton and {Bilton-in-Ainsty.}The surrounding area is mainly agricultural land with scattered farms. The area is in the { {Vale of York}and is very flat. The centres of the three villages are generally old houses with some in-filling of small new developments. In addition,{Tockwith}has a very large new private housing estate which greatly outnumbers the houses in the old village. {Tockwith}is the centre for social and recreational activities in the block. The majority of children come to{Tockwith CE Primary School}between the ages of 5 and 11. Younger children can attend a Pre-school Play Group in{ {Tockwith. } {
